info.name: paradoxical shape
info.description:
mouse controls camera
inspiration: https://twitter.com/gunsnrosesgirl3/status/1688168567210987520
A mirror facing us would also display the other shape: https://trendland.com/troika-squaring-the-circle/

renderpass.code:
#define rot(a)    mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                  // rotation

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.,a,r,z;
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -2.*R.y) - R),                // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,0,10), P,q,                                // marching point along ray 
          C = iMouse.z > 0. ? 8.*iMouse.xyz/R -4.               // camera control
                            : vec3(.5*iTime,0,0);               // demo mode
                         // : 3.* cos(.3*iTime + vec3(0,11,0));
    for ( O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01 )              // march scene
        q = p, 
        q.yz *= rot(-C.y),                                      // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(-C.x),
        r = length(q.xy),
        a = max( abs(q).x, abs(q).y ),                          // z: z-profile such that proj1=square & proj2=circle :
        z = 10. - 20. / ( 1. + r/a ),                           // â†’ z.CS/max(|C|,|S|) = (20-z).CS , view2 = (0,0,20)-view1
        t = length( vec2( a - .2*(10.-q.z) ,                    //          pyramid from viewpoint 1
                       // r - .2*(10.+q.z) ,                    // equivalent: cone from viewpoint 2
                          q.z - z                               // distance to z-profile 
                  )     ) -.1, 
        p += .5*t*D;                                            // step forward = dist to obj  
    
   O *= O*O*O*1.5;                                              // color scheme 
}
